EmailTemplate.name: Evaluation and RAIT Report (foreign language)
EmailTemplate.subject: Evaluation and RAIT Report - {!Job__c.Account_Name__c}, {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
CC PRESENTER
Hi {!Job__c.Account_Sell_1_Name__c}
Attached are the evaluation and RAIT reports for the {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} program that took place on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}.
* Evaluation Report (the Score page is in English – Report with no comments) OR * {!Job__c.Language__c} Evaluation Report (Score page is in {!Job__c.Language__c} along with; workshop comments in {!Job__c.Language__c} – copies are in the file attached).
Also attached is a list of the pax that have indicated they would like follow on support.
Cheers
